## (a).

General Secant Method

$$
x_{n+1} = x_n - \frac{f(x_n)}{|\frac{f_{x+1} - f_{x}}{x_{n+1} - x_n}|}
$$

$$
f(\vec{x}|\theta,1) = \frac{1}{\pi} \cdot \frac{1}{1 + (x + \theta)^2}
$$

```{r}
# set cauchy function
f <- function(x,theta){
  (1/pi)*(1 + (x - theta)^2)
}

# set logliklihood function
ell <- function(theta){
  S = 0
  x <- c(1997,907,904,32)
  for (i in x){
    S <- S + log(f(i,theta))
  }
  return(S)
}
```
